The ECI clarified that one of the EPIC numbers Yadav mentioned doesn't officially exist, requesting further details for investigation. The EC clarified that the SIR exercise hasn't been rolled out in Tamil Nadu yet, making the connection to Bihar's voter list absurd. Chidambaram had questioned the addition of 6.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/misleading-baseless-ec-fact-checks-p-chidambarams-migrant-voters-claim-warns-against-politicising-sir/articleshow/123076309.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/misleading-baseless-ec-fact-checks-p-chidambarams-migrant-voters-claim-warns-against-politicising-sir/articleshow/123076309.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 18:17:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="485141" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123076313,imgsize-485141.cms"/></item><item><title>TMC accuses Delhi Police of insulting Bangla; seeks Amit Shah's apology</title><description><![CDATA[Abhishek Banerjee, a senior Trinamool Congress leader, has strongly criticized the BJP after a Delhi police letter referred to Bengali as "Bangladeshi language." Banerjee condemned this as a deliberate insult and an attempt to undermine Bengali identity, accusing the BJP of systematically maligning Bengal and its culture.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bangladeshi-language-tmcs-abhishek-banerjee-says-delhi-police-insulted-bangla-seeks-apology-from-amit-shah/articleshow/123076188.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bangladeshi-language-tmcs-abhishek-banerjee-says-delhi-police-insulted-bangla-seeks-apology-from-amit-shah/articleshow/123076188.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 18:06:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1123670" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123076262,imgsize-1123670.cms"/></item><item><title>Prisoner number 15528: How Prajwal Revanna spent his first night in jail</title><description><![CDATA[Prajwal Revanna, designated prisoner number 15528, faced a tearful first night in Bengaluru's prison after receiving a life sentence for raping a domestic worker. Emotionally overwhelmed, he broke down during a medical examination, informing staff of his high court challenge to the conviction.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/prisoner-number-15528-how-prajwal-revanna-spent-his-first-night-in-jail-heres-what-prison-authorities-said/articleshow/123076560.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/prisoner-number-15528-how-prajwal-revanna-spent-his-first-night-in-jail-heres-what-prison-authorities-said/articleshow/123076560.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 18:44:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="975140" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123076583,imgsize-975140.cms"/></item><item><title>Bill Gates: AI today can replace human work; but it is not …</title><description><![CDATA[Bill Gates believes AI is rapidly advancing, capable of handling simple coding tasks but not yet the most complex ones. Experts disagree on whether AI will master complex coding within two years or a decade. Gates highlights AI's potential to replace telesales jobs, impacting various sectors.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/artificial-intelligence/bill-gates-says-ai-today-can-replace-human-work-the-most-complex-coding-tasks-but-it-is-not-/articleshow/123068497.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/artificial-intelligence/bill-gates-says-ai-today-can-replace-human-work-the-most-complex-coding-tasks-but-it-is-not-/articleshow/123068497.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 08:25:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43122" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123068513,imgsize-43122.cms"/></item><item><title>Missing for days: 4 Indian-origin senior citizens killed in US car crash; were going to temple</title><description><![CDATA[An Indian-origin family of four, travelling from Buffalo to Pittsburgh, has gone missing, prompting a search operation. Asha, Kishore, Shailesh, and Gita Divan were headed to West Virginia after stopping at a Burger King in Erie, Pennsylvania. Their cell phones are unanswered since Tuesday, and they never checked into their pre-booked lodging.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/last-seen-at-burger-king-four-indian-origin-family-members-missing-in-us-were-en-route-to-temple/articleshow/123073336.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/last-seen-at-burger-king-four-indian-origin-family-members-missing-in-us-were-en-route-to-temple/articleshow/123073336.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 12:56:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1347464" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073338,imgsize-1347464.cms"/></item><item><title>'Cong to reveal serious malpractices of ECI', says Venugopal; declares date</title><description><![CDATA[The Congress party has accused the Election Commission of India (ECI) of "bias" in the ongoing revision of electoral rolls in Bihar, alleging voter exclusion. Senior Congress leader KC Venugopal announced plans to reveal "serious malpractices" on August 5 in Bengaluru. The ECI released draft rolls for Bihar, inviting claims and objections, while opposition parties raised concerns about potential voter deletion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-sir-row-congress-to-reveal-serious-malpractices-of-eci-says-venugopal-declares-date/articleshow/123076098.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-sir-row-congress-to-reveal-serious-malpractices-of-eci-says-venugopal-declares-date/articleshow/123076098.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 17:58:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="561290" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123076138,imgsize-561290.cms"/></item><item><title>Travis Kelce’s family mourns death of Ed Kelce’s partner at 74</title><description><![CDATA[Ed Kelce, father of NFL stars Travis and Jason Kelce, announced the passing of his partner, Maureen Maguire, on August 1, 2025, at the age of 74. Maguire, who grew to love football, often accompanied Ed to games and events. She famously joked with Taylor Swift about her relationship with Ed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-family-in-mourning-after-dad-ed-kelces-partner-maureen-maguire-passes-away-at-74/articleshow/123075791.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-family-in-mourning-after-dad-ed-kelces-partner-maureen-maguire-passes-away-at-74/articleshow/123075791.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 17:17:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1661862" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123075784,imgsize-1661862.cms"/></item><item><title>Grow a Garden trading and cooking event update: Full guide and new features</title><description><![CDATA[Roblox's Grow a Garden has launched its Trading and Cooking Event Update, introducing a fully interactive cooking system and a new trading mechanism. Players can now prepare dishes using harvested crops and trade items more efficiently to unlock rare in-game rewards. The update also includes exclusive cosmetics and unique pets, enhancing the game’s farming-simulation experience.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/gaming/grow-a-garden-trading-and-cooking-event-update-full-guide-to-recipes-rewards-and-new-features/articleshow/123072402.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/gaming/grow-a-garden-trading-and-cooking-event-update-full-guide-to-recipes-rewards-and-new-features/articleshow/123072402.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 11:20:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57200" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123072411,imgsize-57200.cms"/></item><item><title>Chennai shocker: Man beheads wife over suspected infidelity</title><description><![CDATA[A CRPF constable, Tamil Selvan, was arrested in Chennai for beheading his wife in Tuticorin district due to suspicions of infidelity. After murdering Uma Maheshwari, he surrendered his children to his father-in-law and fled. Seeking to publicly discuss the crime, he approached a news channel, whose staff alerted the police, leading to his capture.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/chennai-shocker-man-beheads-wife-over-suspected-infidelity-heads-to-tv-channel-to-talk-of-it/articleshow/123071241.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/chennai-shocker-man-beheads-wife-over-suspected-infidelity-heads-to-tv-channel-to-talk-of-it/articleshow/123071241.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 08:33:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>A SELVARAJ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="48258" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071274,imgsize-48258.cms"/></item><item><title>India ignores Trump threat: No order to refiners to stop buying Russian oil</title><description><![CDATA[Despite US pressure and potential penalties, India has not directed its oil refiners to halt Russian crude purchases, prioritizing energy security and diplomatic ties. Refiners continue sourcing oil based on commercial factors, even as contingency plans for alternative sources are explored.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trump-tariff-threat-no-order-for-refiners-from-india-to-stop-russian-oil-imports-despite-us-pressure-claims-report/articleshow/123074760.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trump-tariff-threat-no-order-for-refiners-from-india-to-stop-russian-oil-imports-despite-us-pressure-claims-report/articleshow/123074760.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 15:43:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50572" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123074848,imgsize-50572.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG : Mohammed Siraj's bizarre blunder leaves Prasidh Krishna red-faced</title><description><![CDATA[Harry Brook's aggressive batting put India under pressure in the ongoing Test match. The incident highlighted the match's dramatic shifts as England aims to win the series, while India fights to level it.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-mohammed-sirajs-bizarre-blunder-leaves-prasidh-krishna-red-faced/articleshow/123075935.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-mohammed-sirajs-bizarre-blunder-leaves-prasidh-krishna-red-faced/articleshow/123075935.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 17:43:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="62174" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123076061,imgsize-62174.cms"/></item><item><title>Mark Zuckerberg meets 24-yr-old AI researcher who rejected Meta's $125m job offer</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's aggressive pursuit of AI dominance led them to recruit 24-year-old Matt Deitke, initially offering $125 million, which he declined. Zuckerberg's personal intervention resulted in a revised $250 million package, including potential $100 million in the first year. Deitke, known for his work on Molmo and founding Vercept, is a highly sought-after AI talent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:36:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058081,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Trains communists ...': Report accuses Harvard of having ties with CCP</title><description><![CDATA[Harvard University faces scrutiny over its decade-long partnerships with organizations linked to the Chinese Communist Party. A congressional probe revealed collaborations with entities like the Central Organisation Department and the Chinese Executive Leadership Academy Pudong. Concerns are mounting about potential foreign influence and national security risks, especially regarding the training of Chinese officials.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/trains-ccps-future-leaders-report-accuses-harvard-of-having-decade-long-ties-to-chinese-communist-party-congress-demands-all-records-by-august-7/articleshow/123075549.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/trains-ccps-future-leaders-report-accuses-harvard-of-having-decade-long-ties-to-chinese-communist-party-congress-demands-all-records-by-august-7/articleshow/123075549.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 17:15:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1326985" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123075789,imgsize-1326985.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Jaws broken, spine fractured’: SpiceJet staff assaulted by army official; airline responds</title><description><![CDATA[In Srinagar Airport on July 26, 2025, a senior Army official allegedly assaulted four SpiceJet employees after being asked to pay for excess baggage. Siraj, now the leading wicket-taker in the series with 20 wickets, previously removed Zak Crawley with a searing yorker. England, chasing 260, are currently at 114 for 3, with India maintaining a strong position.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-morne-morkels-words-mohammed-sirajs-action-ollie-pope-falls-right-after-boundary-discussion/articleshow/123075588.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-morne-morkels-words-mohammed-sirajs-action-ollie-pope-falls-right-after-boundary-discussion/articleshow/123075588.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 17:08:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="135288" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123075637,imgsize-135288.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Drunk man drives car onto Meerut railway platform, narrowly misses train; arrested</title><description><![CDATA[An intoxicated Army personnel, Sandeep Daka, drove his car onto the platform of Meerut Cantt railway station in Uttar Pradesh, narrowly missing a moving train. The Government Railway Police arrested Daka, seized his vehicle, and booked him under several sections of the Railway and Police Acts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-drunk-man-drives-car-onto-meerut-railway-platform-narrowly-misses-train-arrested/articleshow/123075180.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-drunk-man-drives-car-onto-meerut-railway-platform-narrowly-misses-train-arrested/articleshow/123075180.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 16:24:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4708881" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123075270,imgsize-4708881.cms"/></item><item><title>'Alarming, illegal': Chidambaram slams EC over voter addition in TN, deletion in Bihar</title><description><![CDATA[P. Chidambaram criticized the election commission of India for adding approximately 6.5 lakh "migrant workers" to Tamil Nadu's electoral roll while removing around 65 lakh people from Bihar's voter list, terming them "permanently migrated." He questioned the ECI's methodology and described the move as an abuse of power, advocating for political and legal challenges against it.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/alarming-illegal-chidambaram-flags-voter-shifts-questions-ec-over-migrant-inclusion-in-tn-mass-deletions-in-bihar/articleshow/123074838.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/alarming-illegal-chidambaram-flags-voter-shifts-questions-ec-over-migrant-inclusion-in-tn-mass-deletions-in-bihar/articleshow/123074838.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 15:52:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="502425" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123074897,imgsize-502425.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Heated exchange between Yashasvi Jaiswal and Ben Duckett</title><description><![CDATA[Tensions flared at The Oval as India pressed for a series-levelling victory, with Jaiswal and Duckett exchanging words on the field. India's aggressive approach, both with their bowling and verbal pressure, intensified England's chase of 374. Jaiswal's century and crucial fifties from Akash Deep, Jadeja, and Sundar propelled India to a strong position, setting up a compelling Day 4.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-heated-exchange-between-yashasvi-jaiswal-and-ben-duckett/articleshow/123074356.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-heated-exchange-between-yashasvi-jaiswal-and-ben-duckett/articleshow/123074356.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 16:11:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="105556" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123075040,imgsize-105556.cms"/></item><item><title>'I'm going to propose to you': WCL owner's Live TV act leaves presenter stunned</title><description><![CDATA[South Africa Champions secured a dominant nine-wicket victory over Pakistan Champions in the World Championship of Legends final, propelled by AB de Villiers' stunning century. Off the field, league owner Harshit Tomar proposed to presenter Karishma Kotak live on air, creating a viral moment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/im-going-to-propose-to-you-wcl-owners-live-tv-act-leaves-presenter-stunned-watch/articleshow/123074572.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/im-going-to-propose-to-you-wcl-owners-live-tv-act-leaves-presenter-stunned-watch/articleshow/123074572.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 15:18:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32166" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123074611,imgsize-32166.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: ‘Nailed the trap’: How Prasidh Krishna outfoxed Ben Duckett</title><description><![CDATA[Prasidh Krishna's strategic bowling led to the crucial dismissal of Ben Duckett on Day 4, ending a frustrating partnership. After a series of short deliveries, Krishna tempted Duckett with a fuller ball, resulting in an edge caught by KL Rahul. Rescue operations are underway to recover the remaining bodies, while the injured receive treatment at Narasaraopet Government Hospital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vijayawada/granite-quarry-collapse-6-workers-dead-10-injured-in-andhra-pradeshs-bapatla-rescue-ops-on/articleshow/123073623.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vijayawada/granite-quarry-collapse-6-workers-dead-10-injured-in-andhra-pradeshs-bapatla-rescue-ops-on/articleshow/123073623.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 13:43:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MADHU RASALA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="298497" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073726,imgsize-298497.cms"/></item><item><title>Himachal monsoon havoc: 173 dead, highways shut; IMD warns of more rainfall</title><description><![CDATA[Himachal Pradesh is reeling from relentless rain, resulting in blocked roads, power outages, and disrupted water supplies, with Chamba, Kullu, Mandi, and Una being the worst-hit districts. Critics accuse Gandhi of making baseless allegations and disrespecting the deceased leader.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/let-departed-rest-in-peace-bjp-slams-rahul-gandhi-over-arun-jaitley-threatened-him-claim-rijiju-asks-how-much-can-one-lie/articleshow/123072275.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/let-departed-rest-in-peace-bjp-slams-rahul-gandhi-over-arun-jaitley-threatened-him-claim-rijiju-asks-how-much-can-one-lie/articleshow/123072275.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 11:17:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1118808" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123072379,imgsize-1118808.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Sundar Pichai gets taste of something new during IND vs ENG 5th Test</title><description><![CDATA[During the fifth Test between India and England, Google CEO Sundar Pichai surprised fans by joining the commentary box alongside Harsha Bhogle. Following the win, de Villiers joined Wayne Parnell in recreating the viral "aura farming" dance, delighting fans.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-41-year-old-ab-de-villiers-flaunts-his-aura-in-viral-celebration-after-wcl-2025-title/articleshow/123073547.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-41-year-old-ab-de-villiers-flaunts-his-aura-in-viral-celebration-after-wcl-2025-title/articleshow/123073547.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 13:24:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="26512" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123073585,imgsize-26512.cms"/></item><item><title>Guns, Jeans, and Republican: How Sydney Sweeney became MAGA's new muse</title><description><![CDATA[In an era where even a sneeze can be interpreted as a political statement, Sydney Sweeney has become the conservative darling of the year—without attending a single rally or issuing a single press release. The star of Euphoria and The White Lotus has, quite by accident, become a MAGA icon. All it took was a leaked Republican voter registration, a denim ad campaign misread as a white supremacist dog whistle, and a shooting range video that could’ve doubled as NRA propaganda. Welcome to 2025, where political identity is crafted less by what you say, and more by which side claims you.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/sydney-sweeney-maga-trump-jd-vance-republican/articleshow/123072638.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/sydney-sweeney-maga-trump-jd-vance-republican/articleshow/123072638.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 12:03:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2694029" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123072638,imgsize-2694029.cms"/></item><item><title>Earthquake hits New Jersey; tremors felt across parts of New York </title><description><![CDATA[A magnitude 3.0 earthquake rattled parts of New Jersey and New York on Saturday night, with the epicenter near Hasbrouck Heights, New Jersey. Tremors were felt across New York City and northern New Jersey, causing brief but intense jolts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/earthquake-hits-new-jersey-tremors-felt-across-parts-of-new-york-what-we-know-so-far/articleshow/123071205.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/earthquake-hits-new-jersey-tremors-felt-across-parts-of-new-york-what-we-know-so-far/articleshow/123071205.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 03 Aug 2025 08:44:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30118" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123071268,imgsize-30118.cms"/></item><item><title>Chhattisgarh: 78 kids served mid-day meal partially eaten by stray dog</title><description><![CDATA[In Chhattisgarh's Balodabazar district, 78 students received anti-rabies vaccines after allegedly consuming mid-day meals contaminated by a stray dog. Despite students' and teachers' concerns, the self-help group responsible for the meals served the food, prompting outrage from parents and villagers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/raipur/chhattisgarh-78-school-children-served-midday-meal-contaminated-by-stray-dog-given-anti-rabies-shot/articleshow/123062849.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/raipur/chhattisgarh-78-school-children-served-midday-meal-contaminated-by-stray-dog-given-anti-rabies-shot/articleshow/123062849.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 18:45:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RASHMI DROLIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63760" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123062839,imgsize-63760.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
